== Ubuntu New Orange ==
The theme is work in progress.

I have based over UbuntuClearlooksGummyHardy created by Kenneth Wimer.

=== Concept ===
My idea is to create a theme that not diverge from the actual(gutsy) ubuntu theme. Because a new concept of theme will be create only in Hardy+1 as told by Ubuntu Team.

'''Concept Art'''

* I have modified some color scheme going to the orange color and clearer.
* I have rounded the buttons of the menubar. And more...
* I have commented in the gtkrc the changes that i have applied.
* The theme is to be considered still working in progress.
* It's only a draft
